verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: said] [ARG1: Kanye West has " performed a great service to the black community " in a tweet on Friday morning , seemingly in reference to the rapper]
President Donald Trump said Kanye West [V: has] " performed a great service to the black community " in a tweet on Friday morning , seemingly in reference to the rapper
